item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1754; 09:52PM; 714 W 75th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QKrRCN; Vermont Knolls; The first 26 firefighters extinguished flames consuming a converted detached garage to the rear of a single family home in 10 minutes. The garage, converted to a living space, was unoccupied at the time. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation. Nothing further.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E14 E215 E221 E264 E266 E33 E64 RA264 RA846 SQ21 T15 T21 T64 T66; CH7; 14; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1754; 09:42PM; 714 W 75th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QKrRCN; Vermont Knolls; One-story single-family home with fire showing from the rear. Offensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E14 E215 E221 E264 E266 E33 E64 RA264 RA846 SQ21 T15 T21 T64 T66; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#0966; 03:34PM; 15278 W Lakeside St; MAP: https://bit.ly/39V8pme; #Sylmar; Forward progress of the fire has been stopped at approximately 25 acres - combination of grass and brush. Firefighters assigned to structure protection defended homes on several sides of the fire, while air and ground crews made direct attacks on the flames to snuff out this fire in one hour and 40 minutes. No structures damaged. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation. We thank our friends at LA County FD for quickly sending crews to support, and LAFD volunteers from Crew 3 and CERT for their rapid response and support on scene.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 CE59 CE83 CE84 CM42 CW3A E100 E104 E107 E109 E24 E275 E28 E288 E298 E7 E70 E77 E8 E81 E87 E88 E90 E91 E98 E99 EA1 EM15 H3 H5 H6 HA3 HA5 HA6 PI4 RA81 RA91 RI600 T75 T88 WT77; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Brush Fire; INC#0966; 03:15PM; 15278 W Lakeside St; MAP: https://bit.ly/39V8pme; #Sylmar; Currently, over 100 LAFD firefighters, along with assistance from LA County FD and LAFD Crew 3 (volunteer hand crew), have responded to attack the brush fire by ground and air. Approximately 7 acres have burned, with no structures damaged. MEDIA: Public Information Officer/Captain Branden Silverman en route, ETA 3:55pm.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 CM42 CW3A E100 E104 E107 E109 E24 E275 E28 E288 E298 E7 E70 E77 E8 E81 E87 E88 E90 E91 E98 E99 EA1 EM15 H3 H5 H6 HA3 HA5 HA6 RA81 RA91 T75 T88 WT77; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#0966; 01:54PM; 15278 W Lakeside St; MAP: https://bit.ly/39V8pme; #Sylmar; Approximately one-quarter-acre of vegetation burning uphill, moderate rate of spread, with the possibility of one home threatened.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC15 E275 E28 E288 E8 E81 E90 E91 E98 EM15 H0C H0F RA81 T75 T88; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1697; 10:11PM; 12100 W Osborne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HSgyob; #HansenDam; It took 50 firefighters 40 minutes to extinguish several brush fires in the Hansen Dam area that totaled (combined) approximately one acre. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 E24 E275 E298 E7 E77 E90 E91 E98 EM15 H2 H3 H4 H5 HA2 HA3 RA91 RH114 T75 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1697; 09:31PM; 12100 W Osborne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HSgyob; #HansenDam; Half-acre of light/medium brush on fire, no wind, no structures threatened.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 E24 E275 E298 E7 E77 E90 E91 E98 EM15 H2 H3 H4 H5 HA2 HA3 RA91 RH114 T75 T98 WT77; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

Update Physical Rescue; INC#0589; 10:25AM; 3174 N Deronda Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xPD0JQ; #HollywoodHills; Firefighters extricated one patient from an overturned vehicle approximately 20 feet down an embankment, which came to rest on or near a multi-story residential structure. Occupants of the structure have been safely evacuated. It is unknown if the structure has been compromised. Firefighter-paramedics transported one elderly female to a local hospital in fair condition. Nothing further. ; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E261 E27 E52 E76 E82 EM5 HR3 RA52 RA76 T27 T61 UR88; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#0589; 09:38AM; 3174 N Deronda Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xPD0JQ; Hollywood Hills; One vehicle over the side, approximately 40 feet down. Firefighters are preparing to extricate one patient.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E261 E27 E52 E76 E82 EM5 HR3 RA52 RA76 T27 T61 UR88; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1108; 04:47PM; 7801 N Vicky Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ofh2He; #WestHills; Firefighters arrived to find an auto and attached garage engulfed in flames, spreading to the home by way of the attic. Firefighters quickly deployed hose lines inside the home to prevent further damage. It took 32 firefighters 22 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E104 E105 E106 E293 E305 E73 RA104 T105 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange
